intro: Hoffmannia robusta, commonly known as the African violet, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its thick, fleshy stems and velvety, heart-shaped leaves. Hoffmannia robusta is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
